name: YouTube - Earth Hour 2012 (Dark)
description:
On March 31, 2012, YouTube added a light switch on all video pages for Earth Hour. When clicked, the switch made the page turn dark as shown in the screenshot. After the 31st, the switch will probably be removed, and so will the dark style of YouTube. I have extracted the images and CSS from the dark YouTube and put them in this style. This style will allow you to enable YouTube with the "lights out" even after Earth Hour has ended, and the style is applied all throughout the site.

All of the code and images come from YouTube. All I have done is made them compatible to work in Stylish.

Enjoy.
- JohnTuley

user.name: johntuley
user.about:
I create some small styles every now and then which tweak only a few things on sites, but eventually I will make a style that applies to an entire site. It's something I've wanted to do for a while, just never got around to it. :P
I have a Donation button although I doubt anyone would ever donate, I haven't made anything worth donating yet. But it's there for the heck of it ...

I might add on to this later. :P

additional_info:
April 3, 2012 - Fixed the YouTube logo in the top-left corner displaying random icons. Fixed "invisible" text (text color matching background color) in some places. Removed no longer needed code (removed code for the switch that was displayed during Earth Hour.)
April 4, 2012 - Fixed the header of the page having a different background.
April 6, 2012 - Fixed video descriptions extending over the "Show more" button.
